references.paper_title: Bias and refinement of multiscale mean field models
references.reason: This paper introduces the framework used in the current paper to study the convergence rate of stochastic approximation algorithms.
This paper provides a general overview of the dynamics of stochastic approximation algorithms.

references.paper_title: Stochastic approximation: a dynamical systems viewpoint
references.reason: This is a textbook reference on stochastic approximation providing a complete overview of the field.

references.paper_title: The ode method for convergence of stochastic approximation and reinforcement learning
references.reason: This paper introduces the ODE method used in the current paper to study the bias of stochastic approximation.

references.paper_title: Approximation methods which converge with probability one
references.reason: This is one of the seminal papers on stochastic approximation, introducing the basic concepts and algorithms.
